plot: After the death of Mao's mother, who was called the "Fairy of Cuisine", Mao must strive to become a legendary chef himself, in order to take the title as head chef at his mother's restaurant. To do this, he must travel China to learn the many ways of cooking. During his journey, he meets great friends and also fierce rivals.
opening_theme: "息もできない (Iki mo Dekinai) ~Now I can breath~" by ZARD (eps 19-36)
"君さえいれば (Kimi Sae Ireba)" by DEEN (eps 37-52)
ending_theme: "青い空に出逢えた (Aoi Sora ni Deaeta)" by Arisa Tsujio (eps 1-20)
"風のように自由 (Kaze no You ni Jiyuu; Free Like the Wind)" by Keiko Utoku (eps 37-52)
